title: Comment from The Center on Budget and Policy Priorities

analysis.key_quote: This proposed rule would politicize the civil service to a greater degree than any time since the 18th century – despite legislation enacted since that time that has clearly sought to avoid that outcome.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization, due process violations, and the undermining of merit-based protections for civil servants. It emphasizes the potential negative impacts on the integrity and functionality of the civil service system.
